brainly_data.question: The front of the house ia a triangle. The height of the house is 20ft. The area of the front of the house is 600 square feet. What is rhe base of the front of the house
brainly_data.subject: Mathematics

all_answers.question: The front of the house ia a triangle. The height of the house is 20ft. The area of the front of the house is 600 square feet. What is rhe base of the front of the house
all_answers.subject: Mathematics
all_answers.text:
Height x base = area
20b=600
b=30

30 square feet
